name: BizTalk Map File
summary: Learn about .BTM files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: BTM files can be edited using the BizTalk Mapper program within Microsoft Visual Studio.

description: Data mapping file used by BizTalk Server, an application designed to integrate systems and automate processes across global supply chains; contains relationships between different schemas, or databases of information.
